name: suitecommerce-types
description: monorepo containing suitecommerce types for different areas.

scripts.build: npx yamat run npm run build
scripts.build-watch: npx yamat run npm run build-watch
scripts.clean: npx yamat run npm run clean
scripts.test-run: npx yamat run npm run test
scripts.clean-npm: npm run clean && find . -name "node_modules" -exec rm -rf '{}' + ; find . -name "package-lock.json" -exec rm -rf '{}' +;
scripts.test: npx yamat run npm i && npm run build && npm run test-run

author: Sebastian Gurin
